EmailTemplate.subject: RE: 401K question (1380655910.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Thanks Brooke! Can you update your profile in MBO Access too so I can submit your account for approval to activate? I have highlighted the step needed below… Thanks!Sara___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Brooke Crouter [mailto:bcrouter2@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, October 01, 2013 3:11 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: 401K question thank you -- that is what I will do! Brooke On Mon, Sep 30, 2013 at 3:34 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Brooke, There is no way to have 100% of your income go twards 401(k). If you want to put in the max amout possible simply set your 401(k) payroll deduction to 50% as this will max out the match and allow you to contribute the largest amount possible. You can update this by loggining and in and clicking on “personal info” (top menu) -> “benefits” (left menu) and then clicking on “update’ under “Retirement Plan” Once your account is active your Business Manager will give you a guided walk through of our system and show you how to use all of the features. The last step is logging into MBO Access <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ8wg9KFfWBeZIS2vJQCki%2DFjjwjefPZokTIfJ2xNVz%5FvWI7EFRrPWsi2WeBUQ%2DdHJ0Sj6FfYYXiC7mB6F6cRmq4Fb1E44MqCMcv4oi36uYLeON8UWs2XDBvRiUAUVQtueQxXi3FbdOroM7tW8txGQlZc7O%2DzjEz%2DUxmR4V%5F%2D4l2BdVw95mGcQx9yqxdHTh6bnhTPE7SLfgwbrx78sgbhRmuLcadGn%5FDXqrPJO6YSZGxwmIsTkuMzwze20cT6k%2C/1gwVMIfFNB5YtkRz%2DO%5FXL6vijzTSbpatqa8zCvjrnZAz0lxBZuPEZRP3vfJ6JpgRYN%2D0LRccOZk21Vt0O%5FHCe45K4NhzIVS8TC%5FGuJiPPaBbWoJGz9hIyo%2DM2WwwrZjRthmfLQ%2C%2C> and completing the “Industry Expertise” and “Disciplines” sections of your profile. This information needed for our workmen’s comp. policy and must be completed before I can activate your account and get you billing. Your user ID and password is the same as your MBO Business Center. I will send you a new client letter to send your customer in a separate email. Pelase let me know when you have compelted the MBO Access profile so I can submit your account for approval. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ8wg9KFfWBeZIS2vJQCki%2DFjjwjefPZokTIfJ2xNVz%5FvWI7EFRrPWsi2WeBUQ%2DdHJ0Sj6FfYYXiC7mB6F6cRmq4Fb1E44MqCMcv4oi36uYLeON8UWs2XDBvRiUAUVQtueQxXi3FbdOroM7tW8txGQlZc7O%2DzjEz%2DUxmR4V%5F%2D4l2BdVw95mGcQx9yqxdHTh6bnhTPE7SLfgwbrx78sgbhRmuLcadGn%5FDXqrPJO6YSZGxwmIsTkuMzwze20cT6k%2C/0xkILICQIUJaukly7tyUIKb9nifUdJ26qPJ%2DBvq538Qq5lxxebGdIHTOo%2DlbP5cET8WLDSgZRIU27C1JTeebdppt1N9IBVWmYQPG1fP3eqZ4RKdq9fRG1qmp7WdA%2DfnHwXg%2C>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ8wg9KFfWBeZIS2vJQCki%2DFjjwjefPZokTIfJ2xNVz%5FvWI7EFRrPWsi2WeBUQ%2DdHJ0Sj6FfYYXiC7mB6F6cRmq4Fb1E44MqCMcv4oi36uYLeON8UWs2XDBvRiUAUVQtueQxXi3FbdOroM7tW8txGQlZc7O%2DzjEz%2DUxmR4V%5F%2D4l2BdVw95mGcQx9yqxdHTh6bnhTPE7SLfgwbrx78sgbhRmuLcadGn%5FDXqrPJO6YSZGxwmIsTkuMzwze20cT6k%2C/1gwVMM7QNEZOogl76fOJI7v5kTDSadartLEyVvrtxvAq1kMjIPT6GWrVgvBUKrgecOW0CFUFRLxA0VtfFOqPUa5q7%5FtJH3iKYW6trbTxWbhdaJ1G%2D%2Dhg852inTMh746m> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ8wg9KFfWBeZIS2vJQCki%2DFjjwjefPZokTIfJ2xNVz%5FvWI7EFRrPWsi2WeBUQ%2DdHJ0Sj6FfYYXiC7mB6F6cRmq4Fb1E44MqCMcv4oi36uYLeON8UWs2XDBvRiUAUVQtueQxXi3FbdOroM7tW8txGQlZc7O%2DzjEz%2DUxmR4V%5F%2D4l2BdVw95mGcQx9yqxdHTh6bnhTPE7SLfgwbrx78sgbhRmuLcadGn%5FDXqrPJO6YSZGxwmIsTkuMzwze20cT6k%2C/1gwVMM7QNENcs0Jk%2Df2VbKTvkCXBaIymvq5uR%5FTp34As3E57YP7ONAz%5FmtxWDpM%5FOvvDAg0eF5UnzQdMJfSad90S4sB8IHu4ez7Jqo3PY6dHJqEk8OBwqK%2Dr0noohPeXnEjYMHc3FSNBcS2rXKw5rQjAGZEvagTCqV%2DEZqM%2C> to MBO Partners! From: Brooke Crouter [mailto:bcrouter2@gmail.com <mailto:bcrouter2@gmail.com>] Sent: Monday, September 30, 2013 8:24 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: 401K question Sara: The only part of my agreement I am not sure about it my 401K. Since I have not reached the max allowable through MBO this year, I'd like the money I make on several jobs to ALL go to the 401K - -how do I make that happen? I am not sure I have that part figured out. Also, I am going to visit a customer who will probably be coming to MBO so they can hire me - will send them the letter and explain it to them -- so you will hear from them this week Brooke
